dk.jakobhandersen.multiregionexporterforcubase

Class ExporterEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.jakobhandersen.multiregionexporterforcubase.ExporterEngine

  • public class ExporterEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that coordinates the actual functionality of the application. Handles connectivity with the UserInterface.
    Author:
    Jakob Hougaard Andersen

    • Method Detail

      • audioOutputterDoneCallback

        public void audioOutputterDoneCallback(int successes,
                                       int total,
                                       AudioOutputter caller)
        Called from the AudioOutputter when this is done
        Parameters:
        successes - the number of successfully created files
        total - the number of the files that were supposed to be created
        caller - the AudioSplitter calling this function

      • audioOutputterPercentageCallback

        public void audioOutputterPercentageCallback(int percentage)
        Called from AudioOutputter to inform user about progress of output process
        Parameters:
        percentage - percentage done (0 to 100)

      • audioOutputterProcessTextCallback

        public void audioOutputterProcessTextCallback(java.lang.String text)
        Called from AudioOutputter to inform user about progress of output process
        Parameters:
        text - what is the outputter doing now?

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Method to be called when closing the application. Interrupts running threads an destroys registered running processes and deletes temporary files

      • createFilesOverwriteAccepted

        public void createFilesOverwriteAccepted()
        Called from the UserInterface when the user accepts overwriting existing files

      • inputAudioFileBuilderCallback

        public void inputAudioFileBuilderCallback(InputAudioFileBuilder caller,
                                          InputAudioFile builtFile)
        Function called by InputAudioFileBuilder when it is done building the InputAudioFile
        Parameters:
        caller - the InputAudioFileBuilder calling this function
        builtFile - the built InputAudioFile

      • readInputAudioFile

        public void readInputAudioFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates a new InputAudioFileBuilder and makes it create a new InputAudioFile as a representation of the specified audio file. The InputAudioFileBuilder later calls InputAudioFileBuilderCallback() when it is done building the InputAudioFile
        Parameters:
        fileName - full path to an audio file

      • readXML

        public void readXML(java.lang.String file)
        Reads a Cubase track file (XML) and parses the content. Calls processAudioBitesFromParser() if the file was successfully parsed
        Parameters:
        file - full path to the XML file to be read

      • registerStartedProcess

        public void registerStartedProcess(java.lang.Process p)
        Method for registering a running Process that needs to be stopped if program is closed before it is done.
        Parameters:
        p - Process to register

      • sendMessageToUser

        public void sendMessageToUser(UserMessageType type,
                              java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message to the user. Printed in the Log window.
        Parameters:
        type - type of message - determines how it is shown.
        message - the actual message

      • setConvertToMp3

        public void setConvertToMp3(boolean convert)
        Called from UserInterface when convert to mp3 is changed/set
        Parameters:
        convert -

      • setMp3ConversionBitrateArgument

        public void setMp3ConversionBitrateArgument(java.lang.String argument)
        Called from UserInterface when mp3 conversion settings are changed/set
        Parameters:
        argument - bitrate argument used in FFMPEG for mp3 conversion

      • setOutputFolder

        public void setOutputFolder(java.lang.String path)
        Sets the output folder and at the same time starts the output process.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the folder in which the output file should be written

      • setTrailingTime

        public void setTrailingTime(double seconds)
        Sets the amount of time (seconds) that each AudioBite is extended in length compared to the actual event/region in Cubase
        Parameters:
        seconds -

      • setWaveformHeight

        public void setWaveformHeight(int height)
        Sets the height in pixels of waveform view
        Parameters:
        height -

        public void setWaveformWidth(int width)
        Sets the width in pixels of waveform view
        Parameters:
        width -

        public void unregisterStartedProcess(java.lang.Process p)
        Method for unregistering a Process previously registered as running.
        Parameters:
        p - Process to unregister

      • useCubaseNames

        public void useCubaseNames()
        Called from UserInterface if the user wants to use output audio file naming based on event names/descriptions in Cubase (in track XML file)

      • useFixedName

        public void useFixedName(java.lang.String n)
        Called from UserInterface if the user wants to use a fixed string for naming output audio files
        Parameters:
        n - the name to be used (will be followed by "_0001", "_0002" etc)

      • waveformGeneratorCallback

        public void waveformGeneratorCallback(WaveformGenerator caller,
                                      boolean success,
                                      InputAudioFile inputAudioFile,
                                      java.lang.String waveformPng)
        Called by WaveformGenerator when it is done generating
        Parameters:
        caller - the calling WaveformGenerator
        success - was it successful?
        inputAudioFile - the InputAudioFile the waveform was created on the basis of (might not be the same as currentInputAudioFile).
